title: Kyochon Chicken Digital Strategy
text:
Project Overview
This presentation outlines a digital marketing audit and growth strategy for Kyochon Chicken.

Website & SEO audit
Social media content analysis
Consumer research insights

title: Up Energy Popcorn Strategy
text:
Strategy Highlights
A market development strategy for a health-forward snack targeting: - Urban cyclists - Gym-goers - Busy parents
Explores brand positioning, NIL deals, and pricing tactics.
